resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create task log

options.name: Execute Responder
options.description: Execute a responder on a selected log

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many task logs

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a single log

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

severity.name: severity
severity.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

date.name: date
date.description: Date and time when the alert was raised default=now
date.ai_hint: Date and time when the alert was raised default=now

tlp.name: tlp
tlp.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

status.name: status
status.description: Status of the log (Ok or Deleted) default=Ok
status.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

follow.name: follow
follow.description: Whether the alert becomes active when updated default=true

artifactUi.name: artifactUi

values.name: dataType
values.description: Type of the observable. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: binaryProperty
values.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written

artifactUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

responder.name: responder
responder.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
responder.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: caseTemplate
options.description: Case template to use when a case is created from this alert

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: description
options.description: Task details

options.name: endDate
options.description: Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.

options.name: flag
options.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.

options.name: owner
options.description: User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.

options.name: startDate
options.description: Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.

options.name: status
options.description: Status of the task. Default=Waiting.

options.name: title
options.description: Task details

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
attachmentValues

values.name: binaryProperty
values.description: The name of the input binary field which holds binary data

options.description: File attached to the log

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

filters.name: filters

options.name: description
options.description: Task details

options.name: endDate
options.description: Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.

options.name: flag
options.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.

options.name: owner
options.description: User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.

options.name: startDate
options.description: Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.

options.name: status
options.description: Status of the task. Default=Waiting.

options.name: title
options.description: Task details

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

dataType.name: dataType
dataType.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
dataType.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the input binary field that represent the attachment file
binaryProperty.ai_hint: The name of the input binary field that represent the attachment file

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: Date of the log submission default=now
startDate.ai_hint: Date of the log submission default=now

ioc.name: ioc
ioc.description: Whether the observable is an IOC (Indicator of compromise)

analyzers.name: analyzers
analyzers.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
analyzers.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

flag.name: flag
flag.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'alert' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation IN ["promote", "markAsRead", "markAsUnread", "merge", "update", "executeResponder", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'merge' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'severity'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'date'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tags'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tlp'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'source'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sourceRef'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'follow'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'artifactUi'
IF dataType == 'file' THEN HIDE parameter 'data'
IF dataType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF id == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation IN ["create", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'customFieldsUi'
IF /jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'customFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'promote' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation IN ["getAll", "count"] THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'observable' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation IN ["create", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "search"] AND resource == 'observable' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "search"] AND resource == 'observable' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation IN ["update", "executeResponder", "executeAnalyzer", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation IN ["create", "executeAnalyzer"] THEN SHOW parameter 'dataType'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' AND dataType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDate'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tlp'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'ioc'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sighted'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeAnalyzer' THEN SHOW parameter 'analyzers'
IF id == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'analyzers'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "search"] AND resource == 'observable' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation IN ["search", "count"] THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'case' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation IN ["update", "executeResponder", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'severity'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDate'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'owner'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'flag'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tlp'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tags'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation IN ["create", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'metrics'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation IN ["getAll", "count"] THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation IN ["update", "executeResponder", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation IN ["create", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF operation IN ["search", "getAll"] AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation IN ["search", "getAll"] AND resource == 'task' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'flag'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "search"] AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation IN ["search", "count"] THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'log' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation IN ["create", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'log' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'log' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation IN ["executeResponder", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDate'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
